value: content=Located just south of town, this unique cafe is located in the same building as a working dairy farm - a glass wall separates visitors from the cows.  Arrive around 4PM if you're interested is watching the daily milking.
content=This guesthouse has been offering accommodation in the area for over 30 years.
content=Helluhraun 13 guesthouse offers three double rooms with breakfast in a very personal atmosphere.
price=Single Room (2008 prices): 8200 ISK (low season) / 15200 (peak season)
content=A family-run hotel located just outside of town that includes a restaurant and tour operations.  All rooms include private bath, breakfast, and free internet access.

content=This four-star hotel has 41 rooms with private bath.  The hotel also offers a restaurant, conference facilities, and includes buffet breakfast.
